title: Development of Microlearning Materials for Tourism English in Vocational High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of English sentences and ability to engage in simple conversations
context.additional_context: Development of field-based English materials centered on Palembang tourist sites, with practical reading materials linked to travel agency operations

learning_goals: Understand and contextualize over 200 basic tourism-related vocabulary items.
Read travel agency scenario-based English passages with 80%+ accuracy.
Complete 90%+ of mobile-delivered microlearning content through self-directed learning.

resources: English Reading Comprehension Assessment Item Bank

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
